adrFormatAddress: 4525 Broadway, New York, NY 10040, USA

originalText.text: The next time I need a tow or need to recommend a car towing service, New York City Auto Glass will be the one. When my rear window was broken by a vandal New York City Auto Glass came right out and changed it. The driver explained that they also have a full car towing service. They were so fast and efficient with my widow that they must be the same at towing.

text.text: The next time I need a tow or need to recommend a car towing service, New York City Auto Glass will be the one. When my rear window was broken by a vandal New York City Auto Glass came right out and changed it. The driver explained that they also have a full car towing service. They were so fast and efficient with my widow that they must be the same at towing.

originalText.text: I was stranded on the Henry Hudson Pkwy when my car had just died. I was able to get off the road into a safe spot. I went onto Google and did a local GPS search for a towing service. New York City Auto Glass came up as the nearest car towing. I dialed and they had a tow truck to my location in minutes. The driver towed my car to a shop where there was an auto tech. He checked out me car and it was running again after a part was delivered. I was told it had something to do with an on board computer. Whatever it was New York City Auto Glass was responsible for a job well done.

originalText.text: When I was stuck in NYC, car towing was my only option. I looked on line and found that New York City Auto Glass was nearby and handled all NYC towing jobs. They were very quick to respond and got my car out of a very dangerous situation. I am very appreciative of the great NYC towing service.

They were very quick to respond and got my car out of a very dangerous situation. I am very appreciative of the great NYC towing service.

originalText.text: When I needed a jump start for my car, I went on my smart phone looking for road service. New York Auto Glass came up as a local car towing service. I called and the tow truck showed up in 30 minutes and got my car started. I will remember them the next time road service is required.

originalText.text: When I needed a tow during the last big snow I called New York City Auto Glass. I had found out from a co worker that they provide a towing service that is very reasonable in New York City and the surrounding areas. That was good to know. They came out to my house and got my car out of the snow pile form the plow so I could get to work.
